descriptions: No attempt to use mathematical representations to describe waves or the relationship between amplitude and energy.
Uses mathematical representations with significant inaccuracies or omissions, demonstrating a limited understanding of wave properties.
Uses mathematical representations with some inaccuracies or omissions. Partially describes the relationship between amplitude and energy in waves.
Uses mathematical representations to generally describe waves, including amplitude, but with minor inaccuracies or lack of detail. Identifies the relationship between amplitude and energy.

Accurately uses mathematical representations to describe waves, including amplitude, wavelength and frequency and how they related to each other. Explains how the amplitude of a wave relates to the energy in a wave.

Accurately and comprehensively uses mathematical representations to describe waves, including amplitude, wavelength and frequency. Provides a detailed explanation of the relationship between amplitude and energy in waves, including quantitative examples and real-world applications.
Demonstrates no understanding of wave properties or the relationship between them.
Provides a very basic and unclear description of wave properties, with significant misunderstandings.
Identifies some wave properties (e.g., wavelength, frequency, amplitude) but struggles to explain them accurately or completely.
Describes wave properties with reasonable accuracy, including wavelength, frequency, and amplitude, but lacks depth or connection to energy.
Clearly and accurately explains wave properties (wavelength, frequency, amplitude) and relates them to the energy of the wave.

Provides a comprehensive and insightful explanation of wave properties and their interrelationships, including a detailed discussion of how amplitude relates to energy, supported by examples and accurate terminology.
Fails to connect wave properties to real-world phenomena or applications.
Attempts to connect wave properties to real-world phenomena but demonstrates a lack of understanding or provides inaccurate examples.
Identifies some real-world phenomena related to wave properties but struggles to explain the connection or relevance.
Connects wave properties to relevant real-world phenomena or applications, providing a basic explanation of the relationship.
Clearly and accurately connects wave properties to real-world phenomena or applications, providing a detailed explanation of the relationship and its significance.

Provides a sophisticated and insightful analysis of how wave properties are applied in various real-world phenomena or technologies, demonstrating a deep understanding of the underlying scientific principles.
